elements.label: The Owl Without a Hat
elements.description: The Owl says that our last character was #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#, our last desire was #LAST_DESIRE#, our last best follower was #LAST_FOLLOWER# and our last book was #LAST_BOOK#.

elements.label: The Wolf at the Door
elements.description: The Wolf will accept anything, and then devour everything, no matter what.
